reasoning: Adding error feedback to 5 pages requires consistent implementation across multiple files but follows standard React patterns. Will likely need a toast notification library (simple dependency) and error handler utility. No infrastructure or complex integrations involved.

scope.notes: 5 page components (ProjectsPage, EquipmentPage, MaterialsPage, AreasPage, DashboardPage) plus utility files for error handling and toast configuration

integrations.notes: May need to add a toast notification library (react-toastify, sonner, etc.) if not already present. These are well-documented and straightforward to implement.

knowledge.notes: Error handling with toast notifications is a standard React pattern. Need to check if codebase already has toast library installed.
